casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lekkie Constantine WILSON. No. 436A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 18, 2008. L. Jayne Stowers, for Wilson. Scott Thomas, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 665 S.E.2d 751.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of September 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of September 2008."
